item.title: Linux Hardening
item.description: Here are some resources for hardening your linux system. Threat Modelling https://www.wired.com/2017/12/digital-security-guide/ Passwords https://www.pluralsight.com/blog/security-professional/modern-password-guidelines Firewall Comparison https://opensource.com/article/18/9/linux-iptables-firewalld SELinux Explained https://youtu.be/_WOKRaM-HI4 Basic Hardening: https://linuxhint.com/linux_security_hardening_checklist/ Intermediate Hardening: https://docs.fedoraproject.org/en-US/Fedora/17/html/Security_Guide/chap-Security_Guide-Basic_Hardening.html Advanced Hardening Resources: https://github.com/shaurya-007/NSA-Linux-Hardening-docs (Kickback) https://amzn.to/3jCp7JC https://github.com/CISOfy/lynis
